View.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Boost sensors capability of medium and Capital Ships. Allocate speed bonus to all units in the vicinity of the Carrier and Production Cruisers. Effect is doubled for the carrier. Shunting power increases additional sensors range, speed bonus and speed bonus area of effect.

1.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Missiles Enabled. 35% Reload and Cooldown Reduction, 15% Accuracy Bonus

2.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: 55% Reload and Cooldown Reduction, 25% Accuracy Bonus

3.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: 70% Reload and Cooldown Reduction, 35% Accuracy Bonus

4.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: 85% Reload and Cooldown Reduction, 45% Accuracy Bonus

5.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: 95% Reload and Cooldown Reduction, 55% Accuracy Bonus

AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Launch a full salvo of 64 14M95-APHE rockets over a large area. Theses Armor-Piercing High Explosive Rockets are effective against all targets.
Launch a salvo of 16 14M95-CM-AT rockets over a large area. Theses Cluster Munitions Anti-Tank Rockets are effective against small and medium targets.
Launch a salvo of 16 14M95-APHE rockets over a small area with unmatched accuracy. Theses Armor-Piercing High Explosive Rockets are effective against all targets.
Launch a salvo of 5 CG315 Cluster -Grenades- in rapid succession to the designated target area. Theses Short-Range Cluster Grenades are effective against small and medium units.
AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: [f1c232]CLUSTER GRENADES , able to fire over dunes and obstacles.

AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Launch a double salvo of 4 Samiel-Class SRDPM to the designated target area. Theses Short-Range Dual Purpose Missiles are effective against concentration of small and medium units.
AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: [f1c232]TACTICAL MISSILES , able to fire over dunes and obstacles.

AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Launch a double salvo of 8 Samiel-Class SRDPM to the designated target area. Theses Short-Range Dual Purpose Missiles are effective against concentration of small and medium units.
AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: [f1c232]TACTICAL MISSILES , able to fire over dunes and obstacles.

ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Unlock the production of the -Tyrant- Siege Capital Ship
ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Siege platform capable of quick-firing 24 rockets, outfitted with a rapid-autoloader.

ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Unlock the production of the fearsome Seraph class Heavy Armored Capital Ship
ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: The Seraph or -Honorguard- cruiser is armed with a devastating spine-mounted ultra-heavy railgun.

ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Unlock the production of the -Gauntlet- Armored Strike Capital Ship
ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: This cruiser is armed with 2 heavy multiple rocket launcher of 300mm designated to defeat soft targets, armoured units and capital ships with ease. Its clever auto-loader give the Gauntlet the capability to fire a full 12 rocket salvo every 30 seconds.

ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Unlock the production of the Naabal designed -Eclipse- Long-Ranged Capital Ship
ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Capable of unloading a salvo of 64 rockets into a targeted area, the Eclipse is a serious threat to any grouped formation.

ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedShortDescriptionStringID: Unlock the production of the Naabal designed -Eclipse- Long-Ranged Capital Ship
ResearchItemAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID: Capable of unloading a salvo of 64 rockets into a targeted area, the Eclipse is a serious threat to any grouped formation.
